title: Message to K. Voroshilov, Chairman of the Presidium of the Supreme Soviet, U.S.S.R., on National Anniversary of the Soviet Union.
text:
ON THIS national anniversary of the Soviet Union I am happy to convey to Your Excellency and to the peoples of the Soviet Union the best wishes of the people of the United States for progress toward a permanent and just peace.

DWIGHT D. EISENHOWER
